Room.Name: Rosecrest Street
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Rosecrest Street, west of the Ivanhouse Arena.
Room.LongDescription: The Ivanhouse Sporting Facility is located to the east of Rosecrest Street. The large facility sports three distinct arenas, where you can challenge your skills versus various opponents of varying strength. The entrance to the facility is located off of Netherworld Lane, to the south, through the Challenger's Ready Room.
